advancements.soulsweapons.all_moonlight_: Acquire all the different moonlight blades. Swords, greatswords, katanas, you name it!
advancements.soulsweapons.all_weapons.de: Acquire all the Legendary Weapons from this mod
advancements.soulsweapons.arkenplate.des: Craft the Arkenplate and become stronger than diamonds
advancements.soulsweapons.bloodthirsty.d: Use the Bloodthirster while being Bloodthirsty
advancements.soulsweapons.bluemoon_tools: Create weapons of the finest gems, the only thing they need now is raw power...
advancements.soulsweapons.blunderbuss.de: Craft the Hunter Blunderbuss, the bigger the blast, the bigger the damage!
advancements.soulsweapons.cannon.descrip: Craft the Hunter Cannon, aim for the sparrows and unleash a devastating blast!
advancements.soulsweapons.cannon.title: Maybe a little over the top?
advancements.soulsweapons.dragonslayer_s: Acquire Dragonslayer Swordspear. Behold! The Power of the Heavens!
advancements.soulsweapons.draugr_boss.de: Defeat the Old Champion and the creature that has possessed it's remains
advancements.soulsweapons.dream_on.descr: Fall at least 50 blocks and survive thanks to Calculated Fall status effect.
advancements.soulsweapons.dream_on.title: Dream On
advancements.soulsweapons.ender_of_world: The End of the World Ender
advancements.soulsweapons.excalibur.desc: Kill the Warden after acquiring the Excalibur.
advancements.soulsweapons.gatling_gun.de: Craft the Gatling Gun and watch it drain all your ammunition in an instant
advancements.soulsweapons.glaive_of_hodi: Acquire the Glaive of Hodir, decimate your foes with never-ending aggression.
advancements.soulsweapons.hallowheart.de: Craft the Hallowheart and reject the withering
advancements.soulsweapons.heap_of_iron.d: Acquire the Dragonslayer, the heap of raw iron
Craft the Hunter Pistol, a simple, but powerful gun
advancements.soulsweapons.infused_arkenp: Infuse the Arkenplate with the soul of the Night Prowler
advancements.soulsweapons.infused_hallow: Infuse the Hallowheart with the soul of the Day Stalker
advancements.soulsweapons.kill_day_night: Use the Chaos Orb to summon the Day Stalker and Night Prowler, and acquire either of their souls.
advancements.soulsweapons.lord_soul.desc: Acquire a Lord Soul, the remnants of their excistence
advancements.soulsweapons.lords_on_stick: Acquire the Dragon Staff, and it's chaotic counterpart the Withered Wabbajack
advancements.soulsweapons.moonknight.des: Return the Essence of Eventide to it's rightful body, and defeat the godlike being that appears.
advancements.soulsweapons.moonlight_tool: Enhance the weapons to their prime
advancements.soulsweapons.moonstone.desc: Acquire a moonstone, gems shinier than diamonds!
advancements.soulsweapons.nightfall.desc: Acquire the Nightfall and command your own undead army!
advancements.soulsweapons.pure_moonlight: Enhance the greatsword beyond it's prime
advancements.soulsweapons.rageblade.desc: Acquire Guinsoo's Rageblade, attack at light speed!
advancements.soulsweapons.root.title: Soulslike Weaponry
advancements.soulsweapons.transform_scyt: Feed the Darkin Scythe enough souls to transform itself into a new empowered form.
advancements.soulsweapons.trickweapon.de: Acquire your first trickweapon, a weapon that can transform itself into other weaponry!
advancements.soulsweapons.verglas.descri: Aquire Verglas, a cold, smooth material that seems to have some particular liquid trapped inside
advancements.soulsweapons.verglas.title: False Water
advancements.soulsweapons.whirligig_sawb: Acquire the Whirligig Sawblade. Shred your foes out of excistence!
Rip and Tear... until it is done.
death.attack.dragon_mist: %1$s couldn't breathe in the concentrated Dragon Mist
death.attack.dragon_mist.player: %1$s couldn't breathe in %2$s's concentrated Dragon Mist
death.attack.freyr_sword: %1$s was sliced away by %2$s's Sword of Freyr
death.attack.player_fire.player: %1$s was burnt to a crisp thanks too %2$s
death.attack.shadow_orb: %1$s perished after being barraged by %2$s's Shadow Orbs
death.attack.true_magic: %1$s quickly melted away thanks to magic
Silver Bullets apply stacking Blight: more armor = more damage taken.
enchantment.soulsweapons.chain_lightning: Silver Bullets damage nearby entities with soul infused lightning.
enchantment.soulsweapons.ethereal.desc: Silver Bullets can go through walls.
enchantment.soulsweapons.explosive_round: Silver Bullets explode when hitting an entity.
enchantment.soulsweapons.fast_hands.desc: Reduce charge time or increase use time for Guns.
enchantment.soulsweapons.frostsilver.des: Silver Bullets apply strong Permafrost upon Posture Break.
enchantment.soulsweapons.misfire_curse.d: Each Silver Bullet has a chance to explode and damage the user when shot.
enchantment.soulsweapons.phantom_trace.d: Guns shoot additional delayed copies of the original bullet.
enchantment.soulsweapons.ricochet.desc: Silver Bullets ricochet off of walls a random direction or towards closest mob.
enchantment.soulsweapons.stagger.desc: Apply 'Posture Loss' on target. At max loss, Posture Break target.
enchantment.soulsweapons.tether.desc: Silver Bullets drag the target toward you if outside a certain range.
soulsweapons.weapon.bossRespawnDisabled: §4This boss respawn mechanic has been disabled!§r
soulsweapons.weapon.no_collected_souls: There were no bound allies to collect!
soulsweapons.weapon.no_freyr_sword: There is no Freyr Sword bound to you!

tooltip.soulsweapons.arrow_storm_1: - Send out a storm cloud that rain down
tooltip.soulsweapons.blazing_blade_descr: - Set mobs on fire for longer, scaling

tooltip.soulsweapons.blood_vial_recipe_p: A torn page detailing how to create Blood Vials.
It really is a wonder how the demon hearts can
Crimson Obsidian will damage anything that stands
on top of it and save it's blood inside it. After
a little while and given enough blood has been stored,
the purified blood can be filtered through the block
by placing a cauldron under it. Using glass vials on
this liquid will grant you a Blood Vial, a substance
with great healing properties when used.
tooltip.soulsweapons.bloodlust.1: - Press ability keybind to §cstab yourself§r, dealing
tooltip.soulsweapons.bloodlust.2: damage and bleed buildup to yourself while also
tooltip.soulsweapons.chain_lightning.1: - Damage mobs near the main target with soul infused lightning
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_lore_1: The ancients chose a scholar to be the intermediary
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_lore_2: between the ancients and the demons. Trust was built
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_lore_3: between him and the demon king, and he came to be
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_lore_4: known as the Scholar of the Basal, the greatest ally.
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_helm_lore_1: Despite being immortal, the curse eats
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_helm_lore_2: away at your mind. The scholar would
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_helm_lore_3: soon forget who he was and what he was
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_orb.1: All the colors of light and dark pass through
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_orb.2: this orb. Throw it into the sky to summon
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_robes_descrip: and Dirt blocks for a short duration.
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_robes_lore_1: Blinded by desperation as a mortally wounded
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_robes_lore_2: man, all the scholar could think of was the
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_robes_lore_3: potential for immortality through his curse
tooltip.soulsweapons.charge_bonus_damage: - Having charge increases base damage to a limit.
tooltip.soulsweapons.charge_description_: - Will add §bCharge§r to weapon post hit.
tooltip.soulsweapons.chungus_emerald.par: Use on Moderately Sized Chunguses to barter with them

tooltip.soulsweapons.demon_heart.part_2: the demons, knowing only in secret how
tooltip.soulsweapons.demon_heart.part_3: powerful the demon heart truly was.

tooltip.soulsweapons.doom_description_2: strike, then will go on cooldown.
tooltip.soulsweapons.doom_description_3: - Cooldown is reduced in the Nether

The mist will damage mobs, while healing players.
tooltip.soulsweapons.draugr_info.part_1: Use on the Old Moon Altar to fight the Old Champion once again

Perhaps bringing it to the Old Moon Altar

tooltip.soulsweapons.featherlight_descri: - Inscribed runes makes the weapon light, resulting in high
attack speed while gaining the benefits of a heavy greatsword.

tooltip.soulsweapons.final_wounds.2: to the targets missing health, capped at %s

tooltip.soulsweapons.firethorns.2: to damage the attacker and set it on fire

sword to return the item to yourself. Press

firing an arrow at the player's last attacked
target, dealing up to §c100%§r more damage based
on the target's missing health. If no target
is present, shoots an arrow in front instead.

tooltip.soulsweapons.ghost_glaive.3: posture loss to targets it flies through

then upon landing, smash the ground, damaging

§o'Put me back. Let me protect my people.'§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_day_stalk: Deity of the daylight. Long ago, a group
of ancients prayed to her and her sister.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_night_pro: Deity of night and dark. She promised
godhood if she was summoned. Destruction
and annihilation was what she gave.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_purple.pa: A rare form of souls, thought to be extinct.
It's dark, but balanced color, suggests
the user has lived for centuries.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_red.part_: Soul of the old, forgotten demon king. Even
when the heart was cursed with decay, his
soul never gave in as his undying hatred
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_rose.part: A combination of many lost souls. What is
strange is how many of these souls are
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_void.part: Soul of an ancient one, corrupted by dark
soul energy that would turn any sane soul to
a mindless husk, immune to the passage of time.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_white.par: True soul of the old champion. So

tooltip.soulsweapons.transformation_desc: - Killing mobs harvests their souls, distinguishing
§bBlue§r and §cRed§r souls based on whether the mob
was passive, wielding a ranged weapon, or whether the
mob was a hostile monster. Each number of souls increases
the damage of the weapon. When reaching max number of
souls, the item transforms based on the dominant soul type.
Enchants will carry over to the transforming weapon.
tooltip.soulsweapons.transient_moonlight: - Use to unleash a wide moonlight wave going
through blocks, damaging mobs it passes through
- Use while sneaking to instead shoot out a
tooltip.soulsweapons.transparent.1: - Use to turn the weapon invisible for others
tooltip.soulsweapons.trick_weapon_descri: - Press %s to transform the weapon if in main hand.
tooltip.soulsweapons.umbral_trespass_des: - Use while in combat to enter the soul of the target.
In this state, the user takes no damage. On dismount,
the user leaps out, and the target is dealt heavy damage.
Will target last mob hit. Nothing happens if no mob has
been hit within certain time or is already dead.
You must also be within a certain range of the target.
tooltip.soulsweapons.veil_of_fire_descri: - Press ability keybind to unleash §dMeridia's Retribution§r
and apply §6Veil of Fire§r effect on yourself that will
continuously apply fire damage to nearby mobs.
tooltip.soulsweapons.vengeful_fog_descri: - Using while crouching concentrates the mist,
spraying it out, damaging and applying §5Purified§r
tooltip.soulsweapons.wabbajack_descripti: - Summon random projectiles with random effects.

tooltip.soulsweapons.withered_chest.lore: Distraught by the thought of being manipulated
throughout all these years, the king confronted
his former friend. Little did he know, the end
of the demon race drew near.
As the heart and aegis is filled with new
vigor and power, the heart faintly beats
tooltip.soulsweapons.withered_demon_hear: There is no beating, there is no blood. As the
demon race was cursed by a great artifact long
ago, all life had been drained, yet so much
